ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD image sensor, 420 TV Lines, 3.7mm Pinhole Lens, DC 12V Power Input, 200mA Power Consumption
Effective Pixels: NTSC 510 (H) X 492 (V), PAL 500 (H) x 582 (V). Auto white balance and auto gain control.
Minimum Illumination: 0.1 LUX/F1.2. S/N Ratio: over 48 dB. Synchronous system: internal.
Video Output: 1 Vp-p / 75 Ohms. Audio Output: 2 Vp-p / 50 Ohms (option). Operation Temperature: -4°F to 122°F.
Color: white. Dimension: 3"(W)x 4.7"(L) x 1.8"(D). Weight: 0.25 lbs. Package contents: covert camera x 1, bracket x 1, user's manual x 1, screw x 2, anchor x 2, 4Pin or 6Pin cable (optional) x 1
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech PIR Sensor Hidden Covert CCTV Camera with 1/3" Sony Super HAD Color CCD, 420TVL, 3.7mm Pinhole Lens for Security Surveillance System
